title: Fact Check Team: Looking at the vaccine and its efficacy, one year later
author: JANAE BOWENS; JOHN SEWARD; The National Desk
description: WASHINGTON (TND) — Tuesday marks one year since Americans started receiving COVID-19 vaccinations. President Donald Trump and President Joe Biden both made big promises when it came to the vaccine and its ability to end the pandemic. On this anniversary, The National Desk's Fact Check Team is looking at just how effective the vaccines have been. Vaccines a proven to reduce the risk of severe illness and death from COVID-19.
